BLRoy18Dii.First Lines: REmorde thyne ey Inwordly.Fyx not thy mynde on fortune þat delythe dyuersly…
BLRoy18Dii.Last Lines: …Of vertues informacioun and goodly doctryne.They whiche be goode of reasoun will inclyne.
BLRoy18Dii.Attributed Title: The proverbis in the syde of thutter chambre aboue of the hous in the gardyng at Wresyll (f. 210, in rubric)
